description:
If a JSP has a configuration element defined for a page-encoding , and a page-
encoding directive specifies a different encoding (say UTF-8) then as per the 
spec a translation exception should be thrown , but is not thrown

Test case:
/jsp20-tests/jsp2/JSPConfneg/pageencoding/*.jsp
summary: Translation Exception not thrown when a pageEncoding directive specifies a different pageEncoding than the one specified by configuration elements
